arts.ttl: MLS Goals of the Week: Giroud, Peglow and More from Matchday 9
arts.sum: From free kick magic to bicycle kicks, there were lots of standout goals on Matchday 9 of the 2025 MLS season

arts.ttl: João Peglow scores first 2 MLS goals, DC United beats Red Bulls 2-1
arts.sum: Luis Barraza played a long goal kick to the attacking third, where Peglow flicked a header forward to himself and beat goalkeeper Carlos Miguel Coronel from the center of the area to give D.C. United a 1-0 lead in the 35th minute. João Peglow scored twice in the first half, his first two goals in MLS, to help D.C. United beat the New York Red Bulls 2-1 on Saturday to snap a four-game losing streak.
